content.description: Start with two jugs around head high all the way to the left of the wall. Traverse to the right until you reach the end of the wall. My route included a mix of crimps, side pulls, and some slopers. **All cracks where mortar is missing between the stones are off limits** Only features on the faces of the rocks can be used.
content.location: This is on the south west wall. If you are standing at the light on Wentworth and 18th St, it is the wall you see when your back is to the skyline.

content.description: Between Clark St and Wentworth Ave in the south loop on 18th st. The underpass has 4 separate sets of man-made limestone walls, totaling around 200 ft of traverse climbing, with endless boulder problem potential.
